advisories: Frequent/Intense Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
Atomic Web Browser Lite is an advanced iPhone Browser which includes Desktop Tabs, Private Mode, Themes, Search Engine Plugins, Rotation Lock , Facebook/Twitter integration and much more.

Feature Highlights:

✔ FULL SCREEN MODE:
Use the entire screen to display a webpage.  No wasted space on toolbars.

✔ TABS:
The user can choose between desktop style tabs or a list view. Simply hold down a link to open it in a new tab or a new background tab.  

✔ MULTI TOUCH GESTURE SUPPORT:
5 multi touch gestures are supported.

Default Values:
-2 finger swipe left: Switch to Previous Tab
-2 finger swipe right: Switch to Next Tab
-2 finger swipe up: configurable in settings
-2 finger swipe down: configurable in settings
-3 finger tap: Enters / Exits full screen mode

✔ IN-PAGE-SEARCH:
Use this feature to easily find a word within a web page.

✔ IMAGE BLOCK:
toggle this setting on/off to save bandwidth on image heavy web pages.

✔ PRIVATE MODE: [OFF by default]
Enabling private mode will stop the browser from remembering history and will clear all cookies on exit.   

✔ ROTATION LOCK:
Enable this feature by press the "+" button then lock rotation.

✔ ADJUST FONT:
Atomic Web Browsers allows the font to be increased or decreased.  

✔ BOOKMARKS WITH FOLDER SUPPORT:
You can add/edit/delete/reorder any bookmark or folder and reorganize your bookmarks and folders. 

✔ SEARCH ENGINE PLUGINS:
Additional search engines can be installed in 2 clicks.   You can also manually add and edit search engines in settings.

✔ BOOKMARK SCRIPTS:
Bookmark scripts are basic JavaScript bookmarklets.   They preform tasks like translate a webpage or lookup a tracking number on UPS.  

✔SHARE LINK With Facebook or Twitter

✔ COLOR-THEMES:
You can change the color of the tool and address bar.

✔ CUSTOMIZABLE FULL SCREEN VIEW:
The forward,back and show tabs button can be displayed or hidden and the button transparency is changeable. 

✔ AIR PRINT: [Requires IOS4.2]

If you have any issues or would like a particular feature added,  please send an email to atomicbrowser@gmail.com.   

✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪✪

releaseNotes:
✔ Support for iOS 6 and iPhone 5

✔ Cleaned up themes.  

✔ Moved progress bar inside the address bar

✔ Added dashboard.
-To edit items added to the dash board,  long press the image

✔ New option to bring up the search bar when opening a new tab
- can be found in settings->tab options

✔ Option to place the quick scroll bar on the left side of the screen for left handed users
- can be found in settings->quick scroll options

✔ Added DuckDuckGo search engine by popular request

Many bug fixes

✔ Quick Scrollbar:
- Allows you to quickly scroll to a section of a webpage


✔ Page Up/Down:
- Scrolls the screen up or down one page
- Can be assigned to Multitouch Gestures, Action menu, and Full Screen buttons

✔ New Gestures:
- 2 Finger tap Top : scroll up on page
- 2 Finger tap Middle : 
- 2 Finger Tap Bottom: scroll down on page
- These are configurable by going to settings->Multitouch Gestures

✔ Added Button/Multitouch options for
- Save to Read It Later
- Save to Pinboard
- Save to Instapaper
- Format with Instapaper
- Format with Readability
- Show hide Quick Scroll Bar

✔ Clear All button added to privacy options
